title: barely earning lp
body:
i took a break from lol after i got promoted to silver ii, i was earning about 21 lp then.
yesterday i came back, played 6 games and didn't lose any of them.
in all of them i earned 18 lp, any ideas?

replies.body: edit: i got promoted to silver i and im earning 17 lp per win
That's how it works.  As you get closer to even matches you win less lp

Welcome back! When it comes to LP loss and gain  it all depends on the difficulty of the game. If your MMR is higher than the opponents you're facing and you'll earn less LP. Keep winning those matches though and your MMR will raise a long with the types of players you face, raising your LP gain.
